$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/history.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/history.text:
V 0.3.2 - 2021-03-16

* Fix history tiddler version
* Fix Import edit name element

V 0.3.1 - 2021-02-23

* ''Important:'' The plugin overwrites [[$:/core/modules/upgraders/system.js]] now

* Add a new tab to the tiddler (i)nfo area
** The "Bundle" tab contains a "list", "export" and "open in ~AdvancedSearch" buttons

* Improve configuration panel
** We have all important settings on 1 page now
** The config panel can be reached from the "bundles" tab in the sidebar

* Make `prefix[--- ]]` the standard for tiddler titles, that are used as comments
** It's easy to read and we didn't get complains for 2 years, since the suggestion was made

* $:/StoryList*, $:/HistoryList*, "$:/state/*" and "$:/temp/*" are importable now
** This will allow us to work with multiple stories

* We use `subfilter` instead of `enlist` now
** This unifies simple-list and filtered-list handling

* Add a plugin icon {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/icon}}

* Slightly improved docs ;) [[Tips and Tricks]]

* Known Issues!
** System tiddlers are always selected atm. This will change in the future, but we need core support here!

V 0.1.3 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 0.1.2 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 0.1.1 - beta 2017.06.18

* improve license links and readme
* fix upgrade.js title

V 0.1.0 - beta

* new name: bundler
* this name change makes it incompatible to older settings!

** new "Enable Overwrite Check" option. default = no

V 0.0.1 - beta

* initial release
* name: bundles

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/readme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/readme.text: ! ~ReadMe * Documentation and more can be found at: https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/bundler * The position of the "Bundles" tab can be selected in the $:/ControlPanel : Bundles tab * There are 2 version of bundles ** Bundle lists ** Filtered Bundles ... which have to be activated by the user * The filter examples can be live tested, clicking on the number besides the "export button" * The Bundler can bundle itself and other plugins into a bundle :-). * You can create several "selections". Those combinations are persistently stored for reuse. * Bundle lists can be built up, over time. Just as the TW evolves. * The "Enable Import Bundle" option lets you collect / log imported tiddlers and create a new bundle, for future use. * This plugin only works with TW >= 5.1.18 since we use the "subfilter" operator which has been added in 5.1.18 * It's easy to add the bundle configuration to the bundle itself eg: ** If the bundle is named: `tagged-test.bundle`, the filter can look like this: `[tag[test]] tagged-test.bundle` * Have a closer look at the ~$:/ControlPanel: Bundles tab for more [[settings|$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/ControlPanel/bundler-config]]. --- ''Important:'' This plugin modifies a core module and templates <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] "><$link to=<>><>

$:/core/ui/ImportListing.title: $:/core/ui/ImportListing
$:/core/ui/ImportListing.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/Import/ \define messageField() message-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define payloadTitleFilter() [getminlength[1]else] \define overWriteWarning() <$list filter="[!has]"> <$text text={{{[subfilter!is[tiddler]then[]] ~[addsuffix[Listing/Rename/OverwriteWarning]get[text]]}}}/> \end \define selectionField() selection-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define renameField() rename-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define suppressedField() suppressed-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define newImportTitleTiddler() $:/temp/NewImportTitle-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define previewPopupState() $(currentTiddler)$!!popup-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define renameFieldState() $(currentTiddler)$!!state-rename-$(payloadTiddler)$ \define select-all-actions() <$list filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]sort[title]] +[search:title{$:/temp/import-search}]" variable="payloadTiddler"> <$action-setfield $field={{{ [addprefix[selection-]] }}} $value={{$:/state/import/select-all}}/> \end <$list filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]sort[title]] +[search:title{$:/temp/import-search}]" variable="payloadTiddler"> hasthen[tc-row-disabled]] ~[subfilteris[tiddler]then[tc-row-warning]] }}}> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes" tag="tr">
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/import/select-all" field="text" checked="checked" unchecked="unchecked" default="checked" actions=<> > <> <> <>
<$checkbox field=<> checked="checked" unchecked="unchecked" default="checked" disabled={{{[hasthen[yes]else[no]]}}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes" tag="div"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes" tag="div" class="tc-flex"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown tc-flex-grow-1 tc-word-break" set=<> setTo="yes" disabled={{{[hasthen[yes]else[no]]}}}> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}<$text text={{{[subfilter]}}}/> <$list filter="[!has]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo="yes" tooltip={{{[addsuffix[Listing/Rename/Tooltip]get[text]]}}}>{{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes" tag="div"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<> setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}<$text text={{{[subfilter]}}}/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes" tag="div"> <$text text={{{[addsuffix[Listing/Rename/Prompt]get[text]]}}}/> <$view field=<>/> <>
<$edit-text tiddler=<> default={{{[subfilter]}}} tag="input" class="tc-import-rename tc-flex-grow-1"/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo="no" tooltip={{{[addsuffix[Listing/Rename/CancelRename]get[text]]}}}> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo="no" tooltip={{{[addsuffix[Listing/Rename/ConfirmRename]get[text]]}}}> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$action-setfield $field=<> $value={{{[get[text]minlength[1]else]}}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>
<$reveal type="match" text="yes" state=<> tag="div"> <$list filter="[{$:/state/importpreviewtype}has[text]]" variable="listItem" emptyMessage={{$:/core/ui/ImportPreviews/Text}}> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/importpreviewtype}}/>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesFi.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesFiltered
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesFi.text:
\define filter-exist() [subfilter{$(currentTiddler)$}] +[has[title]] \define filter-list() [subfilter{$(currentTiddler)$}!prefix[--- ]] \define get-info() <$count filter=<> />/<$count filter=<> /> \define get-tooltip() <$count filter=<> />, out of <$count filter=<> /> tiddlers will be exported. Check for typos! \define count-filter() <$count filter={{$(currentTiddler)$!!filter}} /> \define get-filter-tooltip() <> tiddlers will be exported \define go-advanced-search-filter() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" $value="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $value={{$(currentTiddler)$!!filter}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" $value={{$(currentTiddler)$!!filter}}/> \end \define test-filter() <$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Test the filter" style="cursor:help"> <> \end \define test-filter-text() <$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" actions=<> class="tc-btn-boxed" tooltip="Test the filter"> Open this filtered list in ~AdvancedSearch \end \define go-advanced-search-list() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" $value="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $value={{{[all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:regexp[(.*)],[$1 ]]}}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" $value={{{[all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:regexp[(.*)],[$1 ]]}}}/> \end \define test-list() <$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" actions=<> class="tc-btn-boxed" tooltip="Test the filter"> Open this list in ~AdvancedSearch \end <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="new-filtered.bundle" tags="$:/tags/Filter" description="provide a meaningful description to display in AdvancedSearch: Filter!" filter="adjust this filter: [list[$:/StoryList]]" text="
{{!!filter}}
"/> Filter Bundle <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Filter]]"> <$link to=<> tooltip=<> > {{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/export-bundle-filter}} <> <>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesLi.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesList
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesLi.text:
\import [[$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesFiltered]]

<$button>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" 
title="new.bundle" 
tags="$:/tags/Bundle" 
type="text/plain" 
text="tiddlerName
[[tiddler with spaces]]"/>
New Bundle List
</$button>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Bundle]]">

<$link to=<<currentTiddler>> tooltip=<<get-tooltip>> >
{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/export-bundle}} <<get-info>> <<currentTiddler>>
</$link>
</$list>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/t.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/test-filter
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/t.text:
\define go-advanced-search-filter()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" $value="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $value={{$(currentTiddler)$!!filter}}/>
\end
\define test-filter()
<$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" actions=<<go-advanced-search-filter>> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Test the filter">
{{$:/core/images/info-button}}
</$button>
\end

<<test-filter>>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/ControlPa.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/ControlPanel/bundler-config
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/ControlPa.caption: Bundles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/ControlPa.text:
\define deleteTiddlerInfoDefault() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/config/TiddlerInfo/Default"/> \end !! Enable Tiddler Info Button <$vars tv-config-toolbar-icons="yes" tv-config-toolbar-text="yes"> ><$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/info" field="text" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show"/> {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/info}} -- {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/info!!description}} !! {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/InfoPanelMode!!caption}} <<< {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/InfoPanelMode}} <<< !! Enable Import Bundle <<< <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/wikilabs/enableImportBundle" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Enable Import Bundle Everytime you import content, an [[import.bundle]] tiddler will be created. If the tiddler already exists, the new imported titles will be appended. You can rename or delete the tiddler, to store the setting or get rid of it. <<< !! Enable Filtered Bundles <<< <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/wikilabs/enableBundles" field="text" checked="enabled" unchecked="disabled" default="disabled"> Enable Filtered Bundles Bundle filters are already used by the "More" dropdown in the $:/AdvancedSearch - Filter tab. The filtered bundle settings provide a slightly different UI to export sets of tiddlers, configured by the user. The "Filter Bundle" button creates compatible configurations. So user created filtered bundles show up in the advanced search panel too! Existing filters can be seen here: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/doc/table-all-filters <<< !! Enable Overwrite Check <<< <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/wikilabs/enableOverwriteCheck" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Enable Overwrite Check By default, the import mechanism overwrites existing tiddlers. By enabling this option, you can activate a mechanism, that creates a new tiddler name. By default this option is off. <<< !! {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/MissingLinks!!caption}} <<< {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/MissingLinks}} <<< !! Set the default ~TiddlerInfo tab <<< <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/TiddlerInfo/Default" field="text" checked="$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/BundleTab" unchecked="disabled" default="disabled" uncheckactions=<> > [[Set the default TiddlerInfo tab to TiddlerInfoBundle|$:/config/TiddlerInfo/Default]] <<< !! Bundle Tab Settings <<< Select the position of the bundle tab: <$tiddler tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Bundles"> <$radio field=tags value="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> "$:/tags/MoreSideBar"
<$radio field=tags value="$:/tags/SideBar"> "$:/tags/SideBar" <<< !! Filter Format <<< ;text :contains the documentation text if needed ;filter :filter to use eg: `[tag[test]]` ;description :descriptive text, that shows up in the AdvancedSearch: Filter: More dropdown <<<

$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/list-links-c.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/list-links-custom/macros
$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/list-links-c.text:
\define list-links-custom(tiddler,field:"list",type:"ul",subtype:"li",class:"",itemTemplate) \whitespace trim <$vars targetTiddler="""$tiddler$""" targetField="""$field$"""> <$type$ class="$class$"> <$list filter="[subfilter{$tiddler$!!$field$}]"> <$subtype$ class="sub-$class$"> <$transclude tiddler="""$itemTemplate$"""> <$link to={{!!title}}> <$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title" /> \end 
<$view />

$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/Bundl.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/BundleTab
$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/Bundl.caption: Bundle
$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/Bundl.text:
\import [[$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/BundlesFiltered]]
Be careful - Make backups!

<hr class="wltc-muted-forground">

<$list filter="[all[current]contains:tags[$:/tags/Bundle]]">
{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/export-bundle}} <<get-info>> tiddlers! <<test-list>>
<hr class="wltc-muted-forground">
{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/listTemplate}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[all[current]contains:tags[$:/tags/Filter]]" >
{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/bundler/ui/Buttons/export-bundle-filter}} <<count-filter>> tiddlers! <<test-filter-text>>
<hr class="wltc-muted-forground">
{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/listFilteredTemplate}}
</$list>
